column50: We use VPC security groups to control access to various AWS services (such as RDS) that is not widely available in current AWS Container services.  Support for configuring SGs across the various container systems in AWS would be great.  For example, Security Groups can be set on EC2 instances and Fargate Tasks but cannot be set on EKS on Fargate, or EKS Managed Nodes.
